description: In this course, students will integrate knowledge gained in previous years with ethical and professional behaviours and clinical reasoning to facilitate the transition into clinical practice. Coursework will focus on professional issues related to physiotherapy, communication with third party payers and be introduced to the systems that underpin health businesses. The learning activities will position the student to be a valued member of any organization to enhance employability.
prerequisites: All Year One, Year Two and Year Three courses for the BPhty (Hons) program
